summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI-Powered Resume Builder & ATS Optimization Agent. All core functionalities are working correctly including manual resume entry, AI enhancement with OpenAI GPT-4o and Gemini 3 Flash, ATS scoring, and PDF/DOCX generation.

design_issues.issue: File input is hidden (expected behavior) but may need better visual feedback for accessibility

passed_tests: Manual resume creation works with all required fields
Resume retrieval by ID functions properly
ATS scoring engine calculates scores accurately (keyword, formatting, section scores)
OpenAI GPT-4o enhancement works correctly and improves ATS scores
Gemini 3 Flash enhancement works correctly and improves ATS scores
Dual AI enhancement (both models) works correctly with highest score improvement
PDF generation works for both original and enhanced resumes
DOCX generation works for both original and enhanced resumes
Landing page displays correctly with CareerArchitect branding
Navigation between pages works correctly (Get Started, Back buttons)
Upload page allows both file upload and manual entry options
Manual resume entry form accepts all required fields
Dashboard displays original ATS score with breakdown
Dashboard displays enhanced ATS score after AI optimization
Enhanced resume content is displayed in tabs alongside original content
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
AI enhancement selection (OpenAI, Gemini, Both) works correctly
Download buttons are present and accessible for both PDF and DOCX formats

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major UI flows working, minor WebSocket connection warnings (non-critical)
